alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 2:08PM AKDT until March 28 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected with blizzard conditions over higher terrain. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less a times. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow, strongest winds and worst visibility is expected over higher terrain.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
